channel.title: Completely Remove Custom Login Screen and Replace
channel.description: Hey, im using the Ruse Release Source, and i was curious as to how I would completely remove the custom ruse login screen and replace it with a regular loading bar and login box? Or better yet how would i add my own login box and loading bar?

item.title: Completely Remove Custom Login Screen and Replace
item.dc:creator: @Pkmasterpwnz Pkmasterpwnz
item.description:
@Pkmasterpwnz wrote:

i get that part about using the cache and changing sprites i just dont get how to change the login as its different from a regular login screen.

Read full topic
item.source: Completely Remove Custom Login Screen and Replace

item.title: Completely Remove Custom Login Screen and Replace
item.dc:creator: @Fortitude Fortitude
item.description:
@Fortitude wrote:

Swiffy explains it on the post.

  1. dump the sprites.

  2. edit/replace the background

  3. use galkons client and cache pack them

  4. add the new data into your cache and then reload client.

But in the main thread and throughout the comments it is all explained in detail with pictures how to do it.

Read full topic
item.source: Completely Remove Custom Login Screen and Replace
